io.neba.core.sling

Class AdministrativeResourceResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.neba.core.sling.AdministrativeResourceResolver

  • @Service
public class AdministrativeResourceResolver
extends Object
    Serves as a facade to administrative resource resolvers. Handles the lifecycle of the underlying ResourceResolverFactory, i.e. re-obtains the administrative resolver when the factory changes.
    Author:
    Olaf Otto

        See Also:

      • closeResourceResolver

        @PreDestroy
public void closeResourceResolver()
        Closes and removes the reference to the current administrative resource resolver, as any resolver instance obtained before a factory changed is malfunctioning, even if ResourceResolver.isLive() is true. Does also discard the reference to the factory as it is a service proxy and may not be accessed before it is bound again, as this would result in a deadlock.

      • resolve

        public org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resolve(String path)

      • get

        public org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource get(String path)
        See Also:
        ResourceResolver.getResource(String)

      • getResolver

        public org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver getResolver()
        Exposes the administrative resource resolver. Warning: The returned resource resolver will seize to function if its factory changes and must thus not be retained.
        Returns:
        never null.
